summary: Gives the Courier a much-needed facelift, along with perks, higher skills, and armor that fits his character concept.
descriptionHtml:
There used to be a favorite mod that I loved which changed the appearance of the Courier. Since its now hidden, I decided to make my own. Sure it's not as fancy as some of those follower mods out there, but maybe I can learn how to add custom hair, eyes, and armor to the courier. 

[size=3][b]What does this Mod do?[/b][/size]
[list]
[*][b]Changed Appearance. [/b]There was nothing wrong with his appearance to me, especially if you used a skin replacer it made him half decent looking. However, I changed his appearance so he looked semi-handsome now with the limited Creation Kit sliders. So he should look much better if you are using a skin replacer and improved hair textures.
[*][b]Improved Stats. [/b]The courier is now a level 10 NPC, that levels 25% faster than the player.
[*][b]Perks!.[/b] The courier has perks that befit his new combat style as a thief.  He has the 2nd rank in both marksmanship and light armor.
[*][b]New Equipment.[/b] The courier has a set of light armor, a steel dagger, and an Imperial bow. Plus an amulet to Zenithar.

[/list]
For now, that's all this mod does. Perhaps I will update it in the future if I can figure out how to do custom stuff.
The skin appearing in the images is [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/82948]Virtuvia[/url]﻿.

[size=3][b]
Future Plans[/b][/size]
Custom Skin, Hair, and Armor


[size=3][b]Suggested Mods[/b][/size]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/46693/]Provincial Courier Service [/url](patch now added in optional)
author: MisterB1969
